Gluten-Free: Made with a blend of rice flour and other gluten-free ingredients, perfect for those with gluten sensitivities or celiac disease

name: Cup4Cup Pancake and Waffle Mix, 2 Pounds, Certified Gluten Free, Dairy Free, Non-GMO, Kosher, Made in the USA
short_description: Contains one 2-pound bag of Cup4Cup Pancake and Waffle Mix. One bag makes 8-10 pancakes or 6-8 waffles
Easy Preparation: Just add milk, eggs and melted butter for a quick and easy brunch on the weekend, savory appetizers or for those nights when breakfast for dinner just sounds right
Ideas to Try for Pancakes: Add in your favorite berries, chocolate chips or sliced bananas and finish with a drizzle of maple syrup or freshly whipped cream and berries
Certified gluten-free, dairy free, non-GMO, certified Kosher and made in the USA
Giving up gluten doesn’t mean giving up the foods you’ve always loved
product_description: Giving up gluten doesn’t mean giving up on the foods you’ve always loved.” Thomas Keller’s premium Cup4Cup gluten free Pancake & Waffle Mix is the best way to get light and fluffy gluten-free pancakes and perfectly buttery gluten-free waffles. Preparation is easy: just add milk, eggs and melted butter for a quick and easy brunch on the weekend, savory appetizers or for those nights when breakfast for dinner just sounds right. Add in your favorite berries, chocolate chips or sliced bananas and finish with a drizzle of maple syrup or freshly whipped cream and berries. This mix is also dairy free and great for crepes and funnel cakes.

name: Kinnikinnick - Pancake & Waffle Mix - Gluten Free, Allergy Friendly Vegan Pancake and Waffle Mix - 16 oz. Boxes - 3 Pack
short_description: GLUTEN FREE PANCAKE AND WAFFLE MIX: Kinnikinnick's Gluten Free, Vegan and Allergen Free Pancake and Waffle Mix is loved by all, even those who can eat Gluten!
LIGHT AND FLUFFY is the best way to describe the gluten-free pancakes and waffles you will make using this mix! So versatile - you can even use it for cookies, cakes, breads, and batter.

PREPARATION: Simply combine ingredients, whisk the batter, let it sit, then drop onto a griddle or waffle maker for a scrumptious breakfast. Make it your own by topping with fresh fruit, syrup, or allergen free chocolate chips.
FOR EVERY DIET: Kinnikinnick's range of mixes and prepared treats are guaranteed to make anyone with a food intolerance feel normal again and feel like they belong.

KINNIKINNICK’S COMMITMENT: Crafting safe and scrumptious gluten-free baking since 1991- free from dairy, nuts, peanuts and soy, we are a family-owned business loved all around the world by those with dietary restrictions.

name: ProDough Shop Buttermilk Pancake and Waffle Mix - Gluten Free, Low Carb, High Protein Pancake Mix - Healthy Pancakes and Waffles for Breakfast or Snack
short_description: ALL NATURAL INGREDIENTS: Our pancake mix is made with natural ingredients, nothing artificial. Our all natural gluten-free flour blend, used in the pancakes, is packed with buttermilk powder, has no artificial flavors or colors added, and contains ingredients shown to improve digestive health and antioxidants proven to help reduce inflammation and promote improved digestion & gut health. It's perfect for anyone on a gluten free diet or anyone looking for a high-protein breakfast option.

HIGH PROTEIN PANCAKE MIX: Our gluten-free pancake mix is high in protein (25g) and perfect for those on a keto or low carb diet. This healthy pancake mix is also wheat-free, soy-free & sugar-free for those with food allergies or sensitivities.

BUTTERMILK PANCAKE MIX: Our buttermilk pancake mix makes light and fluffy pancakes that are delicious, even by themselves & without the help of your favorite pancake syrup. Top it off with your favorite fruit toppings to make your experience on a new level. This cake mix can also be used to make waffles — just add water to the batter and pour it into your waffle maker for a quick breakfast or snack.

QUICK AND EASY BREAKFAST IDEAS: With our easy-to-use pancake mix, you can have breakfast ready in no time! Just add water, stir well, cook on a griddle or in a waffle maker, and enjoy your delicious pancakes or waffles with your favorite toppings. Additionally we provide a high protein preparation option by simply replacing the water with milk and adding an egg.

LOW CARB, NO ADDED SUGARS our pancake mix is specially formulated for those with gluten sensitivities and those needing low carb diets with high protein. Our product is made in Utah with the highest standards of quality, nutrient rich ingredients.

Create light and fluffy gluten free buttermilk pancakes in minutes—just add cold water, milk, and eggs, whisk the batter then pour onto a lightly greased griddle
This gluten free buttermilk pancake mix is carefully crafted with the perfect touch of buttermilk—great for breakfast, snacks, and beyond
Krusteaz Gluten Free Light and Fluffy Buttermilk Pancake Mix contains no artificial flavors, no artificial colors, and no artificial preservatives
Krusteaz Pancake Mix is highly versatile—try using a waffle iron to create easy gluten free waffles with the recipe on the back of the box
product_description: Product Description Gluten free and gaga for great tasting pancakes? Krusteaz Gluten Free Buttermilk Pancake mix was made for you. Our real sweet-cream buttermilk makes these pancakes light, fluffy and delicious. Just add water, milk and eggs to the mix for mouth watering pancakes in minutes with no artificial colors, no artificial flavors and no artificial preservatives. name: It's Really Vegan Gluten Free Pancake & Waffle Mix | Dairy Free, Egg Free, and Soy Free Mix Pancake Waffle | Serving Size 1/3 Cup Mix (40g)
short_description: QUICK AND EASY: Our delicious, simple Pancake & Waffle Mix is easy to prepare–the only ingredient you need from your kitchen is water. To make up to 12 4" pancakes, or seven 4" waffles, combine 2 cups of dry mix and 1 cup of water. Cook pancakes for 1 1/2 minutes on each side, or until golden brown. For waffles, cook the desired amount in the waffle iron until steaming stops and waffles are golden brown.
